EmailTemplate.textOnly: What’s digital cohesion? It means a unified digital experience for your customers as they travel across all your channels from mobile to ATM to Branch. One that provides a consistent experience and knows the customers, their needs and preferences. It means migrating a transaction from one touchpoint to another so it’s effortless to complete the task. But cumbersome, siloed, legacy systems mean that’s not always possible. The solution? An enterprise ATM software ecosystem.
